text:
M. S. Novik
September 3, 19Sh
My dear Graydon:
Trying to make Ann Arbor and Tansing in one day
is hard on the old body, but it was more than comÂ¬
pensated ty the experience of spending time with
the group at the workshop. They were hard working
and mighty interesting.
Rudy and Ed certainly are doing a top job, and
I got that from three different groups.
Congratulations to you for getting Rudy to
spend a year at Alabama. Believe it or not, I
didn* t know that you had moved so far.
Sincerely,
MSN:ck
cc: Me. Skoraia
